Docs.summary: Represents support for HTML input controls in an application.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Mvc.MvcHtmlString CheckBox (this System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper htmlHelper, string name);

Docs.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The name of the form field.
Docs.summary: Returns a check box input element by using the specified HTML helper and the name of the form field.
Docs.returns: An input element whose type attribute is set to "checkbox".

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Mvc.MvcHtmlString CheckBox (this System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper htmlHelper, string name, bool isChecked);

Docs.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The name of the form field.

true to select the check box; otherwise, false. The value of the check box is retrieved in this order - the object, the value of this parameter, the object, and lastly, a checked attribute in the html attributes.
Docs.summary: Returns a check box input element by using the specified HTML helper, the name of the form field, and a value to indicate whether the check box is selected.
Docs.returns: An input element whose type attribute is set to "checkbox".
